messages.title: A personal message from Flick Drummond
messages.content: I will champion our city in Westminster and beyond.

messages.title: A bright future for Portsmouth
messages.content: I am delighted that Portsmouth continues to be the home of the Royal Navy. We will have new aircraft carriers, Type 45 and Type 26 ships as well as the maintenance of the Navy at our dockyard. This will provide jobs and boost the economy.

messages.title: I love living in Portsmouth
messages.content: I am an active member of several organisiations around the city.

messages.title: Competent leadership or Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: Job total hits record high while wages surge.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bringing in more diverse investment to our city so we have a range of employers helping to create jobs and brighter futures.
Working to ensure that every child achieves their potential at school and college through good teaching and leadership.
Better access to GPs so that people can see a doctor in a timely manner, ensuring A&E departments are freed up for emergencies.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron, Ed Miliband, Nigel Farage, Nick Clegg, Vince Cable, Alex Salmond

issues.economy: Job total hits record high while wages surge.
issues.education: Working to ensure that every child achieves their potential at school and college through good teaching and leadership.
issues.environment: I set up Pompey Litter Pickers and campaign on the environment.
issues.health: Better access to GPs so that people can see a doctor in a timely manner, ensuring A&E departments are freed up for emergencies.

housing.content: Portsmouth is beautiful but we can improve our environment. Pompey Litter Pickers raises awareness of rubbish. After all, a clean city is a safe one to live in.

leaflet.personalStatement: Like so many others over the years, I have adopted Portsmouth as my home and fallen in love with the city. Having lived and worked in the Middle East, Asia, and Europe, nowhere compares to Portsmouth.

politicalExperience.achievements: Governor of Milton Park School and trustee of the Citizens Advice Bureau.

images.caption: Flick Drummond talking with two individuals
Flick Drummond with Pompey Litter Pickers

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed by (Name obscured), at (Address obscured). Promoted by Jennifer L Thompson on behalf of Flick Drummond, both of (address provided).
